name: Bouncy Feel
description:
Gamefeel project

Team members: Kobe Darko, Faris Alotaibi, Hongyi Zheng

Toggles: 

  • Press 1 to enable squish animation
  • Press 2 to enable Trail 
  • Press 3 to enable camera shake 
  • Press 4 to enable particle effects
  • Press 5 to enable sound
  • Press P to pause
